citations.narrative:
The license moved his facility to a new address. The licensee failed to notify APHIS Officials 90 days prior to making this
change. Licensees must notify APHIS 90 days prior to making a change in business location. This information is essential
to facilitate unannounced inspections and communications with the licensee.
Correct by: This was corrected at the time of inspection
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The license moved his facility to a new address. The licensee failed to notify APHIS Officials 90 days prior to making this 
change. Licensees must notify APHIS 90 days prior to making a change in business location. This information is essential 
to facilitate unannounced inspections and communications with the licensee. 
Correct by: This was corrected at the time of inspection 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
